q: What happens when I bake cookies?
a: When you bake cookies, your CRO gets locked into the Cookie Monster smart contract and rewards you with 8% daily return every day.

q: Can I take my initial CRO back?
a: Over Time! Cookies are not bought, cookies are baked therefore they can't be sold. Once cooki are baked they work for you indefinitely, providing you with an unlimited amount of CRO at a starting rate of 8% daily.
There is a small 10% dev fee in order to pay for marketing costs and developing the Cookie Monster ecosystem

q: When is the best time to bake cookies?
a: Always! No matter when you hire miners, you will begin with a return rate of 8% daily.
WE recommend that you compound at least once per day but you are free to do so as often as you wish.

Cookie Monster are sustained by continued community support, just as every other crypto coin, token or project. The difference is that since there is no token, there is no price to dump. As long as cookies are baking in the contract, there will be rewards!

q: How to use Cookie Monster on my phone?
a: You can either use an app with a dapp browser and choose the Metamask/Injected option or simply use any browser that you want and choose WalletConnect to connect to your wallet's app on your phone.

q: Is it better to re-bake or eat cookies?
a: By design, re-baking will be more profitable than eating cookies in the long-term.

Once your CRONOS wallet is connected to the CRO Miner website, you will notice your referral address appear at the bottom of the page. When a new user hires miners after clicking your personal referral link, the contract will send a CRO value equal to 12% instantly to your baking cookies. Be smart, use it to bake cookies and build yourself a stream of income.
